dcterms:creator: Daniel Holden
Jun Saito
Taku Komura
dcterms:description: A dataset containing motion data for character locomotion on various terrains, used to train models for generating realistic transitions in animations.
dcterms:title: Terrain Locomotion

dcterms:creator: Daniel Holden
Jun Saito
Taku Komura
dcterms:description: A comprehensive dataset that includes various types of locomotion data, used for training models in character motion synthesis and editing.
dcterms:title: All Locomotion

dcterms:description: A collection of motion capture data used for various animation tasks, though not explicitly cited in the paper.
dcterms:title: Motion Capture (MOCAP) Data

dcterms:description: A category within the dataset that includes various miscellaneous movements not specifically labeled.
dcterms:title: Others
